h2_title: Earth Wolf Miniboss Fight and Guide
content: However, if you get locked in the grab, you’ll be tossed up in the air and land right on its bony back and horns, taking major damage as it shakes you off. Watch for both of its paws to reach out to know when to dodge this move.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Earth_Wolf.md', within the main section titled 'Earth Wolf', specifically from the subsection 'Earth Wolf Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
However, if you get locked in the grab, you’ll be tossed up in the air and land right on its bony back and horns, taking major damage as it shakes you off. Watch for both of its paws to reach out to know when to dodge this move.
